Texts.Chs: 真棒。你应该会用到^green;大量的高级塑料^reset;，所以请保证储量！接下来，我们来获得夜视功能，怎么样？
Texts.Eng: Bravo. You'll need ^green;a lot of plastic^reset; so keep stocked! Now let's help you see in the dark, shall we?

Texts.Chs: 很好。既然你已经制作出^orange;温室^reset;，那我们可以真正开始了！可能你最想得到的是^orange;蕨树^reset;，它产出的^orange;真丝纤维^reset;是制作^green;高级塑料^reset;的材料之一。没有这个真的很不方便。真丝纤维也可以在商店卖出一个不错的价格。快点快点。
Texts.Eng: Sweet. Now that you have a ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; we can really get working! The first plant you'll probably want to make is the ^orange;Bracken Tree^reset;, as the ^orange;Silk^reset; it creates ultimately leads to ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset;. Without plastic, you're sunk. Silk also sells for a decent profit. Win-Win.
